channel.title: CVE Feed for kevinlangleyjr -- Widget Settings Importer/Exporter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kevinlangleyjr -- Widget Settings Importer/Exporter

item.title: CVE-2020-36769|2024-08-04T17:37:07.166Z -- kevinlangleyjr -- widget%20settings%20importer%2Fexporter
item.description: The Widget Settings Importer/Exporter Plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the wp_ajax_import_widget_dataparameter AJAX action in versions up to, and including, 1.5.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with subscriber-level permissions and above to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
